H0.text: Help eliminate body wastes is what the skin, lungs, and kidneys work together to do.

H1.text: Help blood circulate is the function that the skin, lungs, and kidneys perform together.

H2.text: Aid in digestion is the function performed by the skin, lungs, and kidneys working together.

H3.text: Aid in respiration is achieved by the skin, lungs, and kidneys working together.

A4.text: The kidneys remove from the blood the nitrogenous wastes such as urea, as well as salts and excess water, and excrete them in the form of urine.

A5.text: In humans and other am artÄ±r... most of these substances leave the body as urine and to some degree exhalation, mammals also expel them through sweating.
